review: excellent chat AI system. particularly love the privacy policy of Mistral and the high speed in the AI's responses. would love to have the chain-of-thought part as an option since it doesn't add any value to my experience as a user. kudos to the AI engineers and the app developers! UPDATE: today the app suddenly stopped working. the chatbot works fine on the web. tried reinstalling it without any luck. shame though because I had become partial to it... Switching to mobile browser from now on...
